name: cgspace-submission-guidelines
description: Generate CGSpace submission guidelines documentation website.

scripts.build:css: sass --style expanded source/scss/style.scss assets/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --with-rebase assets/css/style.css.tmp -o assets/css/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run clean

author: Alan Orth
